meanings.definition: Having a dignified and impressive appearance or manner.
meanings.sent1: The queen walked in a statelier manner than the other guests at the ball.
meanings.sent2: The grand palace looked even statelier at night when it was all lit up.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to act statelier by wearing a tiny crown on its head.
meanings.sent4: The old oak tree stood statelier than all the other trees in the forest, like a wise guardian.
meanings.sent5: The statelier mountains in the distance seemed to touch the sky with their majestic peaks.
